WorkItem.Description:
Hi guys,

Do you have any version of NCalc compatible with the latest Antlr3.Runtime version?

I am having dependencies issues because other NuGet packages I am using require newer versions of it. I couldn't find the Antlr3.Runtime version NCalc is using to embed that version of the source code into my app, so, if you have a link to get the code, that would solve my issue too 

Thanks!

Comments.Message:
Hi,

why didn't compile you ncalc for the new Antlr3.Runtime version for yoursef?

Best regards

Alpecin
